Description:
Candidate should have a minimum Bachelor Degree or above.
Have an instinctive feeling about future product concepts.
Consume good analytical skills.
Be a good listener, able to respond to results and consumer research.
Excellent communication skills, both verbally and in writing.
Be enthusiastic, energetic and passionate about their product area for continuous involvement in the creativity and development of the company brand.
Be able to work well with a wide range of people from different parts of the business.
Obtain team leader traits to inspire others.
Capable of managing different projects at the same time
Be organized and methodical
Ability to work well under pressure 
Have good presentation skills.
 Experience with and an understanding of market research
The ability to manage and allocate budgets
Team working skills
Creativity and an ability to produce innovative and strategies to come up with original ideas and campaigns.
Analytical skills and attention to detailJob Details
